lines.text: Set three velocities to match the graph

secText: In the activity in this section, you see a position-time graph of a ball. The target graph has three straight-line segments: from 0 to 3 seconds, 3 to 7 seconds, and 7 to 10 seconds. You set the velocity for these three time intervals.
Your challenge is to set the velocity for each interval to match the target graph. The velocity is constant for each of the intervals.
